sentence_zh_TW: 學生們在校園宿舍生活，這讓他們有機會交朋友並參加活動。
sentence: Students live in campus ______, which gives them the chance to make friends and participate in activities.

sentence_zh_TW: 他們在學校的宿舍裡生活，這樣可以隨時參加各種活動。
sentence: They live in the school's ______, which allows them to participate in various activities at any time.

sentence_zh_TW: 市場的向下趨勢引起了投資者的擔憂，他們開始重新考慮投資策略。
sentence: The market's ______ trend raised concerns among investors, leading them to reconsider their investment strategies.

sentence_zh_TW: 在長途旅行中，很多乘客會在車上打瞌睡來休息一下。
sentence: During long journeys, many passengers tend to ______ on the bus to catch some rest.

sentence_zh_TW: 這次劇烈的政策改變將影響到所有的員工，並需要他們適應新的工作環境。
sentence: This ______ policy change will affect all employees and require them to adjust to a new work environment.

sentence_zh_TW: 在夏天，良好的通風有助於讓室內保持涼爽，減少空調的使用。
sentence: In summer, good ______ helps keep the indoors cool and reduce the use of air conditioning.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的梳妝台上擺滿了化妝品和配飾，讓每個早晨的準備過程變得輕鬆愉快。
sentence: Her ______ is filled with makeup and accessories, making her morning routine easy and enjoyable.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這道沙拉上，淋上她最喜愛的醬料，使每一口都充滿美味的風味。
sentence: Drizzling her favorite ______ on the salad makes every bite bursting with flavor.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多人錯誤地認為，成功等同於擁有大量的金錢和財富，這個觀念值得深思。
sentence: Many people mistakenly ______ success with having a lot of money and wealth, a notion worth pondering.

sentence_zh_TW: 在婚禮上，伴郎將新娘緩緩護送到祭壇，讓這一刻充滿了浪漫的氛圍。
sentence: During the wedding, the best man will ______ the bride down the aisle, adding a touch of romance to the moment.

sentence_zh_TW: 獲得子女的尊重是每位父母都努力追求的目標，這是建立良好關係的基石。
sentence: Gaining the ______ of their children is a goal that every parent strives for, as it is the foundation for a strong relationship.

sentence_zh_TW: 在他們的誓言中，他們承諾將對彼此的愛保持永恆，無論風雨如何。
sentence: In their vows, they promised to maintain their love for each other for _______, no matter what storms may come.

sentence_zh_TW: 在緊急情況下，應立即撤離所有居民，以確保他們的安全和健康。
sentence: In an emergency, it is essential to ______ all residents promptly to ensure their safety and well-being.

sentence_zh_TW: 這片森林擁有許多常青樹，全年都能給予生機與活力。
sentence: This forest is filled with many ______ trees that provide life and vibrancy year-round.

sentence_zh_TW: 這首音樂能夠喚起人們對童年時光的美好回憶，讓聽眾感受到深切的情感聯繫。
sentence: This piece of music can ______ beautiful memories of childhood, allowing listeners to feel a deep emotional connection.

sentence_zh_TW: 考生在考場上需保持冷靜，以便能在考試期間充分發揮自己的學習成果。
sentence: The ______ needs to stay calm during the exam so they can fully demonstrate their learning outcomes.

sentence_zh_TW: 每位考官在評估考生的表現時，都必須保持客觀和公正，以確保考試的公平性。
sentence: Each ______ must remain objective and impartial when assessing the performance of the examinees to ensure fairness in the examination.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學校，努力學習和拓展知識的學生將在各個科目上表現得相當優秀，並獲得優異的成績。
sentence: Students who work hard and expand their knowledge will ______ in their subjects and achieve outstanding grades.

sentence_zh_TW: 這篇文章中經典文學的摘錄讓讀者體驗到了不同文學風格的美。
sentence: The ______ from classic literature in this article allows readers to experience the beauty of different literary styles.

sentence_zh_TW: 食用過量的糖分會引發健康問題，因此應注意飲食中的糖的攝取。
sentence: Consuming ______ sugar can lead to health issues, so one should be mindful of their intake.
